original_text: Then desire when it has conceived gives birth to sin, and sin when it is fully grown brings forth death.
korean_text: 욕심이 잉태한즉 죄를 낳고 죄가 장성한즉 사망을 낳느니라

sentences.original_text: Then desire when it has conceived gives birth to sin
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 욕심이 잉태한 후에는 죄를 낳고

sentences.original_text: and sin when it is fully grown brings forth death
